{
  polly(q: "something"){
    externalID
    name
    url
  }
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "polly": [
      {
        "externalID": "28570031-e2b3-4110-8864-41ab279e2e0c",
        "name": "Behandling",
        "url": "https://some.url/28570031-e2b3-4110-8864-41ab279e2e0c"
      }
    ]
  }
}
